story_07_08000/2401_1001_0100_10: Hey, everybody, I found a way out of here!
story_07_08000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Whew, I was just starting to wonder what our
new life as cave dwellers would be like.
story_07_08000/2401_1001_0300_10:
What did I tell you? As long as you don’t give up,
the road will surely reveal itself.
story_07_08000/2401_1001_0400_10:
You just have to have the kind of unbending
mental fortitude you need to keep going until
you find it.
story_07_08000/2401_1001_0500_10:
You’re right. I was in shock from how suddenly
that all went down, but I can’t allow myself to
be overcome by my fears.
story_07_08000/2401_1001_0600_10: That’s a good point. Well, the exit is right there.
story_07_08000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I should have expected this from a PML Leader.
To be honest, I didn’t think much of you.
story_07_08000/2401_1001_0800_10: Team Break! What do you want from me?!
story_07_08000/2401_1001_0900_10:
If we want to sabotage this loathsome PML,
of course we must also get rid of you!
story_07_08000/2401_1001_1100_10: There’s no way I’m letting that happen!
story_07_08000/2401_1001_1200_10:
I don’t care what your ultimate goal is.
I can’t stand by and watch your cowardly methods!
story_07_08000/2401_1001_1300_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], will you give me a
hand with these thugs?
story_07_08000/2401_0401_1500_10:
I can’t stand people with a sparkle
in their eyes like you have!
story_07_08000/2401_0302_1600_10:
I won’t let Team Break get away
with this!
story_07_08000/2401_0402_1700_10:
I can’t stand people with a sparkle
in their eyes like you have!
story_07_08000/2401_1001_1800_10: I will send all of you into a pit of dark despair!
